FLAVOUR_0_INTRO.message: Avoid the inconvenience of a broken-down hyperspace engine.  Get yours serviced today, by the officially endorsed {name} Engine Servicing Company.

FLAVOUR_0_RESPONSE.message: Chaidh obair-càraidh a dhèanamh air an einnsean agad.

FLAVOUR_1_INTRO.message: I'm {proprietor}. I can service your hyperdrive, guaranteeing at least a year of trouble-free performance.

FLAVOUR_1_PRICE.message:
The cost for servicing your {drive} will be {price}
{lasttime}

FLAVOUR_1_RESPONSE.message: Rinn mi obair-chàraidh air an draibh os-fhànais agaibh.

FLAVOUR_1_YESPLEASE.message: Dèanaibh obair-càraidh air an dràibh agam

FLAVOUR_2_INTRO.message:
Hi there.  We at {proprietor} & Co stake our reputation on our work.
We can tune your ship's hyperdrive, ensuring 12 months of trouble-free operation.

FLAVOUR_2_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
For your {drive}, I'll be supervising the work myself, so you can be sure that a good job will be done, for the sum of {price}.

FLAVOUR_2_RESPONSE.message: Tha an obair-càraidh deiseil. Mòran taing airson ar seirbheisean a chleachdadh.

FLAVOUR_2_YESPLEASE.message: Please tune my hyperdrive at the quoted price

FLAVOUR_3_INTRO.message: Welcome SuperFix Maintenance. Time for your biannual maintenance? Let us SuperFix your hyperdrive!

FLAVOUR_3_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
We can tune your {drive} for just {price}.  There's nobody cheaper!

FLAVOUR_3_RESPONSE.message: Tha an Sàr-chàrachadh deiseil, le barantas Sàr-chàrachaidh!

FLAVOUR_4_INTRO.message:
Welcome to Time and Space.

We specialise in interstellar engines. All maintenance work guaranteed for two years.

FLAVOUR_4_PRICE.message:
{lasttime}
Servicing your {drive} will cost {price}.  Would you like to proceed?

FLAVOUR_4_RESPONSE.message: Tha sinn air an obair air an draibh os-fhànais agaibh a choileanadh.

FLAVOUR_5_INTRO.message: Avoid the inconvenience of a broken-down hyperspace engine.  Get yours serviced today.

FLAVOUR_5_RESPONSE.message: Chaidh obair-càraidh a dhèanamh air an einnsean agad.

I_DONT_HAVE_ENOUGH_MONEY.message: Chan eil airgead gu leòr agam

I_FIXED_THE_HYPERDRIVE_BEFORE_IT_BROKE_D.message: Chàraich mi an draibh os-fhànais mus do bhris e.

YOUR_DRIVE_HAS_NOT_BEEN_SERVICED.message: Cha deach obair-chàraidh a dhèanamh air an draibh agaibh on a chaidh a stàladh {date}

YOUR_DRIVE_WAS_LAST_SERVICED_ON.message: Chaidh an obair-chàraidh mu dheireadh air an draibh agaibh a dhèanamh le {company}

YOU_DO_NOT_HAVE_A_DRIVE_TO_SERVICE.message: Chan eil draibh ri chàradh agaibh!

YOU_FIXED_THE_HYPERDRIVE_BEFORE_IT_BROKE.message: Chàraich thu an draibh os-fhànais mus do bhris e.
